body_html: I agree with your analysis. However, 1) float arithmetics should work the same on gpu and cpu, and 2) values like 9.737195888283742e+23 shouldn't be produced by backprop there at the first place.
body_text: I agree with your analysis. However, 1) float arithmetics should work the same on gpu and cpu, and 2) values like 9.737195888283742e+23 shouldn't be produced by backprop there at the first place.
body: I agree with your analysis. However, 1) float arithmetics should work the same on gpu and cpu, and 2) values like 9.737195888283742e+23 shouldn't be produced by backprop there at the first place.
